title: Serious Platinum Ranked  Team Tryouts LF ( Top, Jg, Supp)
body:
Hi everyone, I'm the support for a competitive ranked 5's team. We are looking for talented and serious players interested in competing at one of the highest levels of League of Legends. Applicants should know that we are a serious team aiming for the high levels of league. Applicants should also know that their time during practice won't be wasted. Everything will be discussed and we will all make sure that the team will be heading in the right direction after every practice.

Our goals as a team will be firstly to improve as much as possible, to participate in the most rewarding tournaments available, as well as achieve Diamond plus ranked 5's. We are not expecting immediate success but we are expecting gradual improvement towards our goals. A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.

Our schedule is to be determined based off everyone's schedule, but keep in mind that we plan to practice as much as possible.

In the next few days we'll be looking to try players out, as is mandatory. Our teams team will be trying all selected applicants out. We expect applicants to respect all other players and to take these games seriously. Please realize that you are trying out for a highly serious and competitive team. We will be judging your game play and comparing it to other tryouts, so please play at your best.

Tryout times will be Thursday, December 10th - Saturday, December 12th from 10pm central and later. We will contact you about tryouts.

We are only trying out for top lane and support. You must be 17 years of age or older as well as being Platinum 5 or higher to apply.

Don't add us, we'll add you.
Please fill out the tryout form below, best of luck.

Tryout Form

Rank:
Role:
I have a microphone (Y/N):
I have Curse Voice (Y/N):
How long have you been playing League?:
Past experience, if any?:
Are you sure you can commit to our team?:
How would you define your play style?:
Questions/Comments/Concerns?:

replies.body:
Rank: PLAT 2
Role: Jungle/Support
I have a microphone (Y/N):Yes
I have Curse Voice (Y/N):Yes
How long have you been playing League?:4 years
Past experience, if any?: Yes, won 3 out of 7 online tourneys
Are you sure you can commit to our team?:Yes
How would you define your play style?:Aggresive Asian playstyle with limits
Questions/Comments/Concerns?:Yes, I am a student. And if i possibly have any opportunities to practice Friday-Sunday willing to play 10 hours plus on those days but other days are for study and school. And im turning 17 in 6 days if that counts o_o hope you consider me I play frequently and will be on and ready to practice ;P if I get picked cheers m8 {{summoner:31}} {{champion:44}} (can play on breaks forever)
